TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON , Mr PERSON , Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively . The first and second applicants live in GPE and the third and fourth applicants live in GPE . They were represented before the Court by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) did not designate an Agent for the purposes of the proceedings before the ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE , CARDINAL DATE , DATE and CARDINAL DATE respectively the applicants were arrested on suspicion of membership of an illegal organisation .
On an unspecified date , ORG filed an indictment against the applicants and CARDINAL other accused . The applicants were charged under LAW with attempting to undermine the constitutional order .

The applicants had legal representation during the proceedings . Mr PERSON was represented by PERSON , Mr PERSON was represented by PERSON İnceoğlu and Mr PERSON and PERSON were represented by PERSON .
The applicants were released pending trial .
On DATE the Istanbul Martial Law Court convicted the applicants as charged .
On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of the first - instance court .
On DATE the Istanbul Martial Law Court convicted PERSON and Mr PERSON and acquitted PERSON Sağır and Mr PERSON of the charges against them .

On DATE the lawyer of the third and fourth applicants , PERSON , appealed against the judgment of ORG in respect of his other clients who had been convicted . The names of the third and fourth applicants , who had been acquitted of the charges against them , were not listed in the appeal petition .

In their observations the Government submitted that the judgment of ORG was served on DATE on Mr PERSON mother , on DATE on Mr PERSON in person , and on DATE on Mr PERSON mother . The Government further stated that PERSON PERSON could not be found at his address and as he had failed to report his new address to the domestic court , the judgment in question was attached to the door of his last known address on DATE in accordance with LAW of ORG .
